greeting.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something you say or do when you meet someone
greeting.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I smiled a polite greeting, but the woman hardly acknowledged me.
The two cousins exchanged greetings  (=greeted each other).
She raised her hand in greeting.
greeting.translation[1].definitions[0].d: something you say or do when you meet someone
greeting.translation[1].definitions[0].e: They briskly exchanged greetings before sitting down to start negotiations.
